title: Until Now, and From Now On
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>....and so, Umi-chan cried like a baby while hugging Honoka-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You can’t imagine that from the current Umi-san, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, but the truth is, she hasn’t changed at all inside<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>....Somehow, I’m really jealous of people that have childhood friends. A companion that shares memories with you from way back.... If this was a show, it would strongly stir the emotions of the viewers....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, but if we keep being friends from now on, even we can say “We’re childhood friends” when we become grannies, can’t we?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>....Is that so? Then that would be really wonderful<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah. I think it’s okay to say that as long as the amount of time you’ve been friends is longer than the amount of time you haven’t known each other<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>....! I will always, always, al~ways be friends with everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Let’s be childhood friends then, Setsuna-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes! I’ll be in your care, Kotori-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
